page.title: 15The Roosters.Markyate.
page.content: {ST.JOHN'S ROOSTERS The Roosters is basically a Men's Club.The men meet every Tuesday in a converted cellar under the Youth and Community Centre which they call the "Rooster Room".They choose their own Committee which organises outings for all the family.Sometimes at Christmas they have a big party in the Centre for the parents.Every year there is a camp organised by the Chairman.Every year the Roosters have tournaments for different club games. Sometimes we can buy T-shirts or sweat-shirts with a Rooster on it. They hold some special event about once a month and someone designs the tickets.It all started when a group of friends, mostly newcomers to the village,used to hold meetings in the Red Lion Public House. From this they decided to hold several dances in the Village Hall but they
